item.title: Gopher Wood Clinic Webpage
item.description: Implemented the following features for Gopher Wood Clinic Webpage. Built a sortable and filterable lookup table/calendar for appointment records using Svelte.js and Node.js. Connected the frontend content with backend MariaDB using HTTP requests. Duration: Aug 2020
